name: part_007
file: tmp_【3DLIVE】Amazing Swing ⧸ 3D新衣装お披露目＆重大告知あり！【 #角巻わため4周年 】 [W6hZ1EYa37g]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_007.mov

scenes.description: Tsunomaki Watame talks about her costumes and plans for her 5th year, including a hint at a new costume reveal.
Performance of the song 'RAINBOW'. Watame reveals a new costume during the second chorus.

subtitles.original: だいぶ増えたよね。
subtitles.english: They've increased quite a bit, haven't they?

subtitles.original: こうやってみるとね。
subtitles.english: When you look at it like this.

subtitles.original: いや、なんかその衣装も増えたことによって
subtitles.english: Well, with the increase in costumes,

subtitles.original: 隣にこう、メンバーと立って
subtitles.english: standing next to other members like this,

subtitles.original: なんかこう、シナジーというか、
subtitles.english: there's some kind of synergy, or...

subtitles.original: なんか... なんだろうね。
subtitles.english: some... what is it?

subtitles.original: なんかね、いいよね。
subtitles.english: It's nice, isn't it?

subtitles.original: 語彙力。
subtitles.english: My vocabulary.

subtitles.original: 語彙力はちょっと、5年目磨きたいなと思います。
subtitles.english: I'd like to polish my vocabulary in my fifth year.

subtitles.original: いや、でもまだまだここでは終わりませんので、
subtitles.english: But it's not over yet,

subtitles.original: えー、この先もぜひ見てほしいなと思っています。
subtitles.english: so I hope you'll continue watching.

subtitles.original: いや、それもあれなんだよ。
subtitles.english: Also, there's that thing.

subtitles.original: サムネ見ていただけたかな。
subtitles.english: I wonder if you saw the thumbnail.

subtitles.original: ま、見てるよね。待機中とかね。
subtitles.english: Well, you probably did. While waiting and all.

subtitles.original: 多分見れるもんね。
subtitles.english: You can probably see it.

subtitles.original: そうだよね。ホロジュールとか載ってるもんね。
subtitles.english: Right. It's on Holodule and stuff.

subtitles.original: あの文字見ましたか。
subtitles.english: Did you see those words?

subtitles.original: し、ん、い、しょう、なんかお披露目があるとか。
subtitles.english: "N-e-w c-o-s-t-u-m-e" unveiling, or something.

subtitles.original: それも、ま、もう後半戦だから、ね、あったりするんじゃないかな。
subtitles.english: That might be happening since it's the second half now.

subtitles.original: ね、見たいよね。
subtitles.english: You want to see it, right?

subtitles.original: いや、お願い、見て、お願い見て。
subtitles.english: Please, watch it. Please watch.

subtitles.original: 頑張るんで。
subtitles.english: I'll do my best.

subtitles.original: 見てほしいなと思います。
subtitles.english: I hope you'll watch it.

subtitles.original: では、ふぅ、落ち着いてね。
subtitles.english: Now, *whew*, let me calm down.

subtitles.original: よし。
subtitles.english: Alright.

subtitles.original: では、次の曲聴いてください。
subtitles.english: Now, please listen to the next song.

subtitles.original: RAINBOW。
subtitles.english: RAINBOW.

subtitles.original:
RAINBOW
作詞・作曲 DECO*27
subtitles.english:
RAINBOW
Lyrics/Music: DECO*27

subtitles.original: ねえ 「おはよう」のあと
subtitles.english: Hey, after saying "good morning,"

subtitles.original: もう落ち込んでるの？
subtitles.english: are you already feeling down?

subtitles.original: ああ やりたいことも
subtitles.english: Ah, the things I want to do,

subtitles.original: 怖い 叶え夢にしたい
subtitles.english: they're scary, but I want to make them dreams come true.

subtitles.original: もうちょっとだけの自分
subtitles.english: Just a little bit more of myself,

subtitles.original: もう一歩が踏み出せない
subtitles.english: I can't take that one extra step.

subtitles.original: そう言えばオッケーだった
subtitles.english: It was okay to say that,

subtitles.original: 逃げていられた
subtitles.english: I could keep running away.

subtitles.original: でも君が笑って
subtitles.english: But if you smile

subtitles.original: 「それでもいい」と言うんだったら
subtitles.english: and say "that's okay too,"

subtitles.original: 恥ずかしいところとか
subtitles.english: the embarrassing parts of me,

subtitles.original: ダメダメなところとか
subtitles.english: the useless parts of me,

subtitles.original: 見せたくなくなっちゃうでしょう
subtitles.english: I won't want to show them anymore, right?

subtitles.original: どんな時も前を向いて歌っていたい
subtitles.english: I want to keep singing while facing forward, no matter when.

subtitles.original: ほら凹んで泣いて辛い時も
subtitles.english: Look, even when I'm feeling down, crying, and having a hard time,

subtitles.original: 強がってるけど平気だよ
subtitles.english: I'm acting tough, but I'm fine.

subtitles.original: きっと君のためならできること
subtitles.english: I'm sure it's something I can do for your sake.

subtitles.original: 涙を大好きにばら撒いて
subtitles.english: Scattering my tears into the things I love,

subtitles.original: 弱くたって虹を呼び出せるよ
subtitles.english: even if I'm weak, I can call forth a rainbow.

subtitles.original: 明日も多分僕次第で
subtitles.english: Tomorrow will probably be up to me,

subtitles.original: 今日よりも輝いていく
subtitles.english: and I'll keep shining brighter than today.

subtitles.original: ねえ 「おはよう」のあと
subtitles.english: Hey, after saying "good morning,"

subtitles.original: なんだか気分がいい
subtitles.english: I feel somehow good.

subtitles.original: もう 「繰り返し」とか
subtitles.english: No more "repetitions,"

subtitles.original: ない そう思えるよ
subtitles.english: none; I can feel that way now.

subtitles.original: 意外と怖くないね
subtitles.english: It's not as scary as I thought.

subtitles.original: あくまで個人の感想です
subtitles.english: *This is just my personal opinion.*

subtitles.original: 秘められた力とか
subtitles.english: Hidden powers,

subtitles.original: 見たことない奇跡とか
subtitles.english: unseen miracles...

subtitles.original: そんなのも妄想しちゃうかも
subtitles.english: I might even fantasize about things like that.

subtitles.original: 用意ドンで僕は変わる
subtitles.english: I'll change at the "Ready, Go!"

subtitles.original: 合図は君に出してほしい
subtitles.english: I want you to give me the signal.

subtitles.original: 大冒険する準備なら
subtitles.english: If it's preparation for a great adventure,

subtitles.original: ちゃんと君の分までしておいたよ
subtitles.english: I've already done your share too.

subtitles.original: どんな時も前を向いて歌っていたい
subtitles.english: I want to keep singing while facing forward, no matter when.

subtitles.original: ほら凹んで泣いて辛い時も
subtitles.english: Look, even when I'm feeling down, crying, and having a hard time,

subtitles.original: 強がってるけど平気だよ
subtitles.english: I'm acting tough, but I'm fine.

subtitles.original: きっと君のためならできること
subtitles.english: I'm sure it's something I can do for your sake.

subtitles.original: 涙を大好きにばら撒いて
subtitles.english: Scattering my tears into the things I love,

subtitles.original: 弱くたって虹を呼び出せるよ
subtitles.english: even if I'm weak, I can call forth a rainbow.

subtitles.original: 明日も多分僕次第で
subtitles.english: Tomorrow will probably be up to me,

subtitles.original: 今日よりも輝いていく
subtitles.english: and I'll keep shining brighter than today.

subtitles.original: La la la...
subtitles.english: La la la...
